name: Three Nights with Dolly
description:
Can you survive 3 nights with Dolly?

You found a security guard job, $ 100 per shift, 3 days. But when you came to work, you suspected something was wrong ... Only you and it remained.

This game was created for FNaF Fan-Game GameJam.

This game was created by one person - me. Also I made this game in 5 days.
